name: Alpine Investors
overview: Alpine Investors, LP is a private equity firm specializing in investments in and acquisitions of small to mid sized companies and also considers minority investments for growth. The firm typically invests through recapitalizations, asset purchases, and stock purchases. Its investments may be used to provide full or partial liquidity to entrepreneurs, family members, estates, passive investors, and corporate owners. The firm typically invests in alarm monitoring; consumer finance; insurance brokers and underwriters, niche software; professional employer organizations (PEOs); direct marketing; gaming equipment and services; route based businesses; internet retail; waste management and rubbish removal; debt collection; outsourced business services; for-profit training and education; ATM operators; consumer products; document storage and management; franchisees; franchisors; jewelry; non asset based logistics; specialty retailer; vending; energy; transportation; distribution; wealth management; and human resource outsourcing sectors. It seeks to invest in companies based in the United States. The firm prefers to invest in companies generating revenues between $50 million and $200 million and having an EBITDA between $2 million and $10 million. For businesses with continuing management, the firm invests in those firms having cash flows between $2 million and $20 million. And for businesses with management transitioning out, it invests in firms with cash flows between $2 million and $10 million. It seeks to make both minority and majority investments in its portfolio companies. Alpine Investors, LP was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in San Francisco, California.
